typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	primarykey as string,
	columnnames as string,
	sourcetablename as string,
	targettablename as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> target
source1 derive(id_hash = md5(byNames(split($primarykey,','))),
		column_hash = md5(toString(byPosition(1))+toString(byPosition(2))+toString(byPosition(3)))) ~> sourcehash
target derive(id_hash = md5(byNames(split($primarykey,','))),
		column_hash = md5(toString(byPosition(1))+toString(byPosition(2))+toString(byPosition(3)))) ~> targethash
sourcehash, targethash exists(sourcehash@id_hash == targethash@id_hash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Inserts
Inserts alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> MarkedInserts
sourcehash, targethash exists(and(sourcehash@id_hash == targethash@id_hash ,sourcehash@column_hash!=targethash@column_hash),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> TrueUpdates
TrueUpdates alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> MarkedUpdates
MarkedInserts, MarkedUpdates union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(!in(['id_hash','column_hash'],name)))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FilterHash
FilterHash sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:[($primarykey)],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
